subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Phil Jackson, the No. 1 target in the Nets’ coaching search, told a Web site on Tuesday that he has “no intention” of returning to the bench, although his statement left room for a change of heart.
snippet: Phil Jackson, the No. 1 target in the Nets’ coaching search, told a Web site on Tuesday that he has “no intention” of returning to the bench, although his statement left room for a change of heart.
